title: when youre playing support and your adc wont stop talking shit

replies.body:
{{sticker:sg-lulu}} 

Truer words have never been spoken. It always drives me crazy when the ADC feels like my help isn’t sufficient, even though I provide enough harass and long-range poke that they should have gotten at least half a dozen kills prior to the twelve minute mark yet they don’t know how to go all in to securethe kill.

Best part is when the ADC does not know how to even farm well, and then tries critiquing your every move or something.... "why did you steal the kill?" Because you were backing out of the tower range and i launched my auto and then you flashed as i was autoing.... "dont waste your health" as i am helping leash the jungler or keep a wave of minions from getting into tower range/was poking the enemy adc off our turret....

Its like.... please, do not try playing 2 characters if you can not even play one. Do not start minorly/possibly majorly flaming other people (i muted them before it got too far) when you keep condeming people out of my thresh hook.... etc. It does not look good.

I've seen both sides of it, when I was farming badly as an adc but I had to sacrifice the creeps because of the poke I was getting they decide to use that as an excuse to sell their spellfhief's edge (and upgrade) and decide to build full ap and still use that excuse as to because I was so behind and he needed to do damage because I was so behind(and he was feeding himself while I tried to play safely as vayne).

In another game I was a xayah and the vel'koz support kept taking farm from me and went too ham and shoved the wave and decided to try to kill the ezreal up close which we all know is a bad idea to do as a vel'koz and flamed the jungler and me for not attacking. Seriously, if you're going to go aggressive don't shove the wave into the turret and stop going ham when you're behind.

As a support I was harassed by a taliyah bot (yes taliyah bot is not a typo), she kept telling me to play aggressively as a nami to get my trinket gold but kept telling her I needed my mana to heal her and she was getting poked a lot. She later kept ping spamming my abilities and items. Seriously it's like there are more toxic players these days.

Yes, there is that side as well.... i will never claim the support is always right or the adc is. However one thing i will stand by is do not try playing 2 characters.... ESPECIALLY if you can not play your own. Tips like "nami Q can be used as a speed boost to get to lane faster as well as E." < is not the same as ""use your Q on me.... why arnt you using it on me?.... useless support." 

Or when the support is trying to help the ADC keep minions and then they flame the support etc.

Yes, ADCs have their own stories, but at the end of the day it is simple. Do not try playing 2 characters. You can give tips to others.... but flame and telling them what to do is not going to do anything.

Yeah, I mostly am a support main and most of the time I get comments like your second example and see things more from the support view even though I try to look at things both ways. I don't flame my adc or jg (and if so extremely rarely) when they are the ones who make mistakes, I try a more friendly (but not perfect) approach like "let's play safe for now, our chance to shine will come" or "hide behind minions if you can, and avoid pushing wave if possible." It's not perfect or good advice but it's better than other criticisms I have taken in the past. I do try to be close to the adc (or other teammates) as much as possible though should they have limited choices or escape or peel.

Yeah I get flamed a lot even when I didn't make a mistake which happens more often than not but I'm am not going to resort to flaming back at them and add more to the fire no pun intended.

Whoever said starting to flame them? Lol it is actually very good advice to let them know "hey. I know what i am doing. Now please stop trying to play two characters and focus on playing your own"

I wont say i will never make mistakes, but i know when and where i made a mistake, in some of the cases like the examples i mentioned...  no. They were not mistakes nor will i ever view them as such.
Btw when you say trying to play 2 characters do you mean trying to manage both adc and support at the same time?

I mean when someone is spending half the time trying to explain what you are doing wrong rather than playing and fixing what they are doing wrong. Often resulting in more of a loss for them because they insist on trying to explain how your character works even if you have 150k.... 200k.... or more mastery points on that champion itself.

Sure if they are new to the champion give a little advice, help them out a bit... but literally going off on EVERYTHING they did? Thats not helpful at all. For either of you.

> [{quoted}](name=Boltonator,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8TIElrEb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-18T14:07:37.819+0000)
>
> {{sticker:sg-lulu}} 
> 
> Truer words have never been spoken. It always drives me crazy when the ADC feels like my help isn’t sufficient, even though I provide enough harass and long-range poke that they should have gotten at least half a dozen kills prior to the twelve minute mark yet they don’t know how to go all in to securethe kill.

I got autofilled support once and went Thresh. The amount of times I saved my ADC and set up kills was insane.

BUT I END UP ACCIDENTLY TAKING A KILL WITH IGNITE ( Applied at the start of the engage) AND MY EZRAEL FUCKING REPORTS ME

like ???????????

I made you.

Exactly :^)

Except for with very very few exceptions.... the adc NEEDS the support. The support, if they feel the ADC is not worthy, can just abandon the ADC and roam to help other lanes and ward around.
Own me daddy

What

Edit: apparently people don't even know the whole meme so I have to actually attach it as an image because im getting downvoted for going with it ._.

http://magaimg.net/img/7iuf.jpg
**OWN ME DADDY**
What

Played with a Vayne ADC a couple weeks back, lane was okay but ended pretty even. However, our mid and jungle were on a general rampage, so i quickly went to their side and started cashing in hard.

Meanwhile, Vayne alone and pushing on the other side of the map gets killed twice and starts raging at me.

I'm just like... "Im helping the actual carries for this game yo. Keep farming and maybe you'll catch up one day."

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

Or you could suggest that the AD comes with and only farms when the lane is about to crash, rather than throwing back. And if they're too good to listen and keep doing what they want (we all know they exist) then you could always push that [mute] button instead of wasting your ~~brain power~~  _**O-oooooooooo AAAAE-A-A-I-A-U-O~ooooooo**_

> [{quoted}](name=Meowlex,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8TIElrEb,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2019-03-18T22:41:52.813+0000)
>
> Or you could suggest that the AD comes with and only farms when the lane is about to crash, rather than throwing back. And if they're too good to listen and keep doing what they want (we all know they exist) then you could always push that [mute] button instead of wasting your ~~brain power~~  _**O-oooooooooo AAAAE-A-A-I-A-U-O~ooooooo**_

Literally the only thing i ever say in league chat is "Hey guys we're ahead, we should end before Nasus/Kayle scales and we get spanked." 

Also, if the vayne wants to farm top while we're pressing and teamfighting, i'm gonna stick with the team.

> [{quoted}](name=GinoSoldier,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8TIElrEb,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-03-18T18:41:08.497+0000)
>
> Played with a Vayne ADC a couple weeks back, lane was okay but ended pretty even. However, our mid and jungle were on a general rampage, so i quickly went to their side and started cashing in hard.
> 
> Meanwhile, Vayne alone and pushing on the other side of the map gets killed twice and starts raging at me.
> 
> I'm just like... "Im helping the actual carries for this game yo. Keep farming and maybe you'll catch up one day."
> 
> {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

You went to help team mates that are fed and dont need your help and left a hyper carry that needs your help alone, iron V logic
Not necessarily. It's a map control game, not a deathmatch. Show up where you're unexpected and take the map faster.

> [{quoted}](name=HàrrowR,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8TIElrEb,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2019-03-18T19:18:10.436+0000)
>
> You went to help team mates that are fed and dont need your help and left a hyper carry that needs your help alone, iron V logic

If i can help close the game before my hypercarry is even needed, i'm gonna do that. While Vayne was dying in toplane we were busy taking inhibs. At least she was a good distraction.

Not to mention, if memory serves my two fed teammates were an Irelia and a pre-rework Kayle, AKA Vayne was completely unneeded.

> [{quoted}](name=GinoSoldier,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8TIElrEb,comment-id=000800000001,timestamp=2019-03-18T21:38:45.931+0000)
>
> If i can help close the game before my hypercarry is even needed, i'm gonna do that. While Vayne was dying in toplane we were busy taking inhibs. At least she was a good distraction.
> 
> Not to mention, if memory serves my two fed teammates were an Irelia and a pre-rework Kayle, AKA Vayne was completely unneeded.

Does anyone even play this game for fun anymore? 
Imagine the ''fun'' vayne had getting ganked 24/7 while trying to farm cause you left her alone

Actually, when dealing with people who are trying to "pad their score" or make me annoyed.... it is quite funny when they send as much as they do for me.

For example me and an ADC were in bottom lane and kept getting ganked by the jungler and mid.... or even just jungler.... and meanwhile our top and mid and jungle were crashing down mid lane. The adc and i were both like "lol, they are spending the time to try and get their bott lane going while they are losing an inhib. Their bot lane isnt even able to do anything xD"

> [{quoted}](name=HàrrowR,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8TIElrEb,comment-id=0008000000010000,timestamp=2019-03-24T15:51:58.985+0000)
>
> Does anyone even play this game for fun anymore? 
> Imagine the ''fun'' vayne had getting ganked 24/7 while trying to farm cause you left her alone

Thing is; This all happened 15+ minutes in the game. Lanes were over, I figured my team needed me to help push the advantage they had and close the game. Vayne on the other hand, instead of joining teamfights just went across the map and pushed toplane repeatedly, dying twice or thrice to the enemy team while we were hitting the other two base towers. She could have joined up with us, or at least tried to ward herself for some safety, but no, nothing.

I didn't just abandon her in lane, we had an okay lane but nothing spectacular, and then i went to help the team when it was done. The support's job is to help the team, not be the ADC's slave. When helping the team is best done by helping the ADC, so be it, but when that's not the case i'll do what i feel i need to do.
No offense but you sound like a terrible support.
Meg and Hades, a true classic.
That’s why I just follow my support around, add some dps to any fight they get in, and just hope they know what they are doing.

I feel a good support is like a mother bird. ADC's are like baby birds that need to be fed before they can fly off on their own. But you must let the baby bird fly. You need to allow the ADC to get the benefits of solo-lane farming. Greater exp, quicker levels, better carry. This is why I try to harass the Hell out of bot to get my ADC nice and secure in their farm supremacy, then I hurry mid with Jungle to try taking charge of objectives. If the enemy support stays bot, my ADC gets exp supremacy and if they hold turret can win lane. If support follows, then my ADC is stacked over theirs. 

That's the goal at least..

*2 minutes into game...*
ADC: "Don't play aggro, I just wanna farm."
Me:  "Ok."
Also ADC: (immediately plays super aggro and dies) (question mark pings repeatedly)
Me:
 {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

> [{quoted}](name=grayamir,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8TIElrEb,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-03-18T19:32:52.568+0000)

Playing support is SUPER fun...with a premade.
With a stranger can be pure hell, yeah.

and, and, when you gank mid right after recall - and the adc has no idea how to play safe.. nor does bother. xd oh and in so many games..

"Where is MINE support?!" - er 'team's' support is roaming the map and helping the different lanes, taking towers (plates)/pushing enemies back, warding, objectives, you know..

if you were nice, you wouldn't have been left alone, by the way.. nor heal-banned.. flagged for ifs.. etc.. at least not so soon ;)

"you are NOT JUNGLER" - y i am supp. (and if i pick it, what do you think is this smite for?!)

"but i NEED LEONA, WHAT is this nonsense you picked?!" - i will pick whatever you want if you go cassiopea, lulu, yasuo, zyra or kayle ad(p)c, np :p

 
sigh just ago had an ashe going for enemy thresh under their tower, while i was lvl 2 karma.. She got the kill, but couldn't escape the enemy yi.. and, ofc, i didn't have E yet.

thing is, this is a dog planet, and humans are not welcome here.. sooorry! :((
Toxic adcs S U C C {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
LMAO.

1 stolen minion = 1 report
I dont care if you have relic shield. MY CS COUNT IS MORE IMPORTANT
the funniest part is that spoils of war still counts towards your ally's CS
exactly.
Ah yes. I have come to the right place. This is where all of us support mains belong.

> [{quoted}](name=Kamille W,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8TIElrEb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-18T14:26:43.072+0000)

Don’t worry,  not all ADC’s fall under this category of meme.

{{champion:117}}
why does his temperature go down when hes mad?
Because he is Distributing his heat in a larger area rather than containing it in a smaller space.

Yesterday I was playing ranked. I was Fiddle support and had Ezreal ADC. And opponent was Draven - Morgana which is very hard to face in current meta. Anyways. We got punched a bit and somehow I got Draven under the turret, took bounty. Get items. And noticed that Ezreal sulked. He started not to take minions when I was nearby. First thought he is writing something, but then noticed that he is not. And I did most logical thing. I took all the minions, went to mid, helped my teammates and we won the game. And when I needed gold I was free to go to the lane where he is.

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
This actually feels like an interaction with a kill-focused Brand who gives no fucks about letting his Miss Fortune scale.

ADC starts getting uppity, I go ward river and since I'm half way there, gank on mid.

ADCs do forget that tiny little detail when they're flaming their support... Supports are built to help you secure kills and/or keep you alive. I can accidentally missclick a few buttons or respond too late or go give my services to someone a tad bit more deserving.
Honestly if the ADC is shit and won't stop talking I just mute and leave lane. At least I can get kills and pressure somewhere else. Let the AD flounder.
adc in the same rank as you is probly a better player
Yeah right clicking is really hard

lol. Silver supports cant ward, cant stop getting killed by cc in lane even though there is no farm for them to contest, cant stop all inning while ad is trying to get cs under tower, cant cc the jungler when bot is getting ganked, cant use sweeper for dragons and barons, waste wards mindlessly and refer u to their vision score when u tell them they aren't warding right. It's completely ridiculous.
The trick is to shit talk them before they can shit talk you, then you win.
